Sub Events.Description: Vanguard Media Group formed a strategic partnership with Digital Channel Inc., a prominent digital media platform provider. This collaboration enables Vanguard to tap into Digital Channel Inc.'s extensive user base, expand its digital content distribution, and enhance its online advertising capabilities.
